content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following responsibility Operations team is in charge of is Managed Services tracking.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Operations team collects and downloads all the customer project L1 tickets per month, prepares reports and presentations and uploads them to Managed Services app, submissing payments in accordance with requests processed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The tool we use to upload reports, submit monthly payments, prolong contracts, etc. is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://msrv.lab.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managed Services (MSRV)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The app helps to facilitate proper budgeting and service margin allocation, establishing Managed Services as a part of the EPAM ECO system.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
